channel.title: Openpose on Dvir Segal's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Openpose on Dvir Segal's blog

item.title: Estimating partial human poses
item.description: A lot has been said on OpenPose. This real-time multi-person groundbreaking keypoints detection method has many features, along with: 2D real-time multi-person keypoint detection 3D real-time single-person keypoint detection Calibration toolbox Single-person tracking Supporting Python API, Unity Plugin, Cuda, OpenCL, and CPU only Moreover, more features are in the works by the team (Gines Hidalgo, Zhe Cao, Tomas Simon, Shih-En Wei, Hanbyul Joo, Yaser Sheikh, and Yaadhav Raaj) at Carnegie Mellon University.
